values: this pisses me off. ive only been asking my mom everyday since ive been here to take me to dair queen for some ice cream. and she wont. and now that my sisters here, and im not home, she decides its a good time to go. and then she goes to qt to get some ice. i ask her to pick me up some chips. she comes home with a drinks for her sarah and amanda, but nothing for me. i hate this. ive always felt like my sister was more important that i was. and i just wish that she would go home. i dont want her here. i dont need her here. i couldnt careless about christmas this year. its stupid and its pointless. and i wish i was back in tennessee having christmas with a family that actually acknowledges that i fucking exist, even if im not the only child around. i hate that my sister always comes first, it isnt fair, and i dont want her to be here. i want her to go home. everything is different when she isnt around, and i hate being second to her. its always been that way. i hate it. i feel worthless whenever shes around.

so, i guess there has kindof been alot going on lately, and i dont even know when the last time i wrote anything in my livejournal was.. other then pictures and a few sentences. but i read megs i think yesterday and it said something about no one even using livejournbal anymore.. so i figured i would update alittle bit.
things are going okay living with my dad. jessie is a bitch, and i basically can not stand her. she always runs her mouth about things that dont concern her, and it really makes me mad, but i dont dare saying anything to her, because i know that she will run and go tell her mom and ill get introuble for it.
i bought a fish, and we named him stupid ass fish.
my dad and i are getting along super well. with the few minor arguements that we get into, which arent out of the ordinary for any teenager. danette and i, we always fight. we just.. cant seem to get along. every little thing causes an arguement between the two of us, and im not really sure why. but even when shes trying to apologize for something, and i think shes going to be mature and realize that its her fault, it always comes back to being my fault. and even when it is my fault, i apologize. so im doing like.. double time apologizing and im getting really sick of it.
derek and jenn might go back out, which i dont know.. i dont know about that whole thing yet. i mean.. they've been getting along really well lately. but like a week or 2 ago, every hour and a half, they were fighting about one thing or another. if they do go back out, i wish them all the luck in the world of having it work out. because when they arent fighting, they make the best couple, and you couldnt imagine them with anyone else. and i was over derek along time ago. as soon as it really started getting into jenn and him, and i saw how he was, and i got to know him again, then i completely changed my whole perspective on it. and now, we're just really good friends, and i wouldnt have it any other way.
im getting super close with brian. we talk every single night for hours. and i dont know why, but i cant seem to get my mind off of him lately. we both like eachother. and we both know that we like eachother, because weve talked about it, and we've talked about going out. but the problem is his ex girlfriend shannah who he went out with for a year and some odd months. shes back in town for christmas. and he doesnt want something to happen between them and hurt me if we were going out. and i can understand that.  now that shes here, hes seen her 2 or 3 times, and every time hes with her, he calls me, and we talk. she isnt making anything different between us, and thats what i was really worried about. brian told me that he didnt want her to come between us, and she isnt. and hes sticking to his word. i think that we're going to go out once shannah leaves, but i dont want to get my hopes up and then be let down by him. but i dont know.
im visiting my mom right now. things were going really fucking great down at my dads. i was sober and keeping myself out of trouble. but i guess things just kindof changed and im getting introuble for no reason at all out here. and i miss brian alot, and i kindof want to go home. u mean, dont get me wrong, i love my mom to death, and i want to see her, and i love being able to see her and get along with her, but i dont know. i might go home a few days early, and besides, my mom said she didnt want me here for new years becauyse she couldnt trust what i would go out and do, and she knew if i was at my dads house i wouldnt be able to get myself into any trouble. but who the fuck knows.
ive seen leah adam and eric and rico since ive been here, and that was good. i guess i had a good time. and tonight after i finish eating my dinner, mom is going to drop me off at mikeys house, and then ill be home by 11/1130ish to catch brians call after the ed gein and reflux show at the muse, which i really wish i was at right now. hes there with shannah, and shes spending the night tonight at his house, which kindof upsets me, but we arent going out, so im trying not to let it bother me. i mean, after all, hes still going to call me tonight..
im worried about rosey. i dont know whats really going on with her lately. rosey, i love you to pieces, and if you need anything, you know im here for you.
my dad finally said that it was okay if meg came down. and i could NOT be happier about that. because i need to see her, shes my best friend and she means the fucking world to me, and just seeing her is going to make everything okay again, until she leaves and then im afraid my world is just going to fall apart, but ill worry about that when the time comes.

i own you.
and

i own you AGAIN

theres a tornado warning for here.
its coming out way. its only 3 hours away
people are freaking.. i dont know why though. i dont think it'll hit us anyways.
i went to the doctors today. they drew my blood. thats not good. im really hoping its not what i think it is, because ill be making a phone call to someone and they wont be too happy to hear from me.
bens mom is coming down the same time that isaac is, and she doesnt want isaac to stay at bens because she wants "quality time" with her son. or something like that. and if my dad says that isaac cant stay with us, its going to be really shitty and hes either gonna have to stay in a hotel, or not come down.
i was suppose to call meg last night, but i was soo busy and went to bed early. so i didnt get the chance too. i hope she isnt mad like she was the other day. I LOVE YOU

today, derek was an ass. not just to me, but to everyone. and its all because of jenn. it really gets to me, that he lets her get to him like that. i just dont fucking get it.
i didnt get to go to the red chord and converge, but derek said he didnt have that good of a time anyways and he was the only reason i was going, i mean, i wanted to go to dance my ass off, but mostly, it was because of him.
cody and i finally had it out. and now we have nothing to do with eachother. its much better this way anyways. i mean, i dont know. i wish we could have ended everything on better terms, but maybe this is just how its suppose to be.
ive been having dreams about mikey. i dont know where the fuck they're coming from. or why im getting them. the past two nights. mikey mikey mikey. its too weird. i dont know.
i miss northampton. it hit me today. real bad.
im uber excited about meg coming down, even if she doesnt think so. i am. its going to make everything so much better. although im worried ill get depressed once she goes away again. but spending a week with her, will be well worth it.
im happy over all
and i got a letter from adam today

obab. almost a year ago.
i didnt even know katey took that picture, even though it looks like im looking at her.
she's sneaky.
look at that huge hickey on Chris' neck. oh gosh.
wow

Derek and Devin while we were waiting in line for the Emery/He is Legend/Gym Class Heroes/As Cities Burn show
which totally owned you all. the picture sucks because it was from my pops cell phone. but oh well.
i crowd surfed/stage dived
i got kicked in the face by some random crowd surfer, because i thought derek was calling me so i turned around, and when i turned back around, BAM. and derek kissed it and made it better
Devin punched me in the head sooo hard when he was slam dancing, i was like owww. and derek kissed that and made it better too.
i danced myself silly during Gym Class Heroes. I heart them.
we got rear-ended on our way home.
i fell asleep with my head on dereks shoulder and his head on mine. aww how cute.
im so excited for next weekend. more time with derek.
i was expecting something to happen between us last night, and i admit i was disappointed when it didnt.
he likes some chick named courtney yates. boo.
whatever though. if it ends up being a waste of my time and energy, than too bad.
atleast i wont be too hurt, because im expecting it, but hoping for something else.

am i better than you because im going?
uh yeah.

i can NOT read friends only entries.
and its pissing me off
i started school today
it was super.

Kristen Griswold
6757 Lovell Cook Rd
Springfield Tn, 37172

thats my new address.
from here on out, thats where i will reside, until i am 18. so all my letters, should be sent there.
and just because im moving, i dont want my letters to stop. because ill need there more now that im there, then i did when i was here, ill be 10 times more lonely there.

its 241, and i dont know where cody is.
im still like OMG over him. just.. fyi.
i hate that im moving
i cant take my kitten
no more weed
no more alcohol
no more sex
my life is going to be super duper boring

615 - 384 - 4791
call me there, as of sunday
im moving to tennessee on sunday

living with cody, is so blah.
i was kinda bummed abouth im moving in, but at the same time i was happy about it.
because i got to go to sleep cuddling with him. but we havent done that once.
because i got to have someone come home and be happy to see me. but that hasnt happen. he comes home and goes to bed basically.
because i thought it would be all sweet and loving. but basically, he's been so mean to me.
i dont know. he told me today that he's just been pissed about everything that's happened. not sad about it. just pissed.
i kinda feel like hes taking it out on me.

im going to be starting Primavera. a new school. that i dont ever actually have to go to.
2 classes for 6 weeks. 10 hours a week in both classes. anytime. anywhere.
its more my thing.
i havent gone to school since tuesday of last week, and moms totally off my ass about it.

i wish i had something to do though. i sleep till like noon.
get up, take a piss, get something to eat, sit on the couch for awhile and then i get stoned and sit on the couch some more.
its so boring. i never do anything.

dad said he sent out my check, but i knew i couldnt count on it. should have been here sunday, but since they dont do mail on sunday, it should have been here on monday, but it wasnt, and it wasnt here today either. i kinda expected that. but i guess i just got my hopes up.. i was expecting alittle more from him this time.

i could have my permit right now, but i dont. and now that i know i can get it whenever i want too, im not too.. eager, or excited about getting it, as i was when i was anticipating it.

im sending another poem in for another book. that used to be excited. but now its boring, and takes up time in my life, not like im doing anything else with me.

im thinking that my life is going to end up beign shit. and im gonna look back on this and think that i should have just gone to school. but whatever. i dont want too. and im not going too. and im getting away with it. and right now, im perfectly fine with sleeping and eating and smoking whenever i want too.

one of megs friends told me i was pretty over a comment today.
it made me smile, and it kinda made me feel alittle better.

i rented alot like love and i watched it while cody was gone, because i knew he wouldnt want to watch it. it was good. i liked it alot.

cody isnt smoking pot anymore. and its weird. now he's all like.. DONT SMOKE POT. and its weird. i just dont understand him. we're soooo different, and im not sure whats going to happen. and i feel like i need to be going out with him, because he lievs with me. but i havent been thinking about breaking up with him, but what if i do sometime before he moves out. cody told me that if i dropped out, that he would break up with me, because he doesnt want to date a drop out, but lately, its seemed like he doesnt want to be dating me.. period. i dont know. things are weird.

i moved my room around today, because i got sick of cody stepping all over the bed and ontop of me to get to the closet, so i moved the bed farther from the closest so he can walk between the bed and the closet, which he couldnt do before, and he had no choice but to step on the bed. i also put his nightstand on his side, so my shit was on my nightstand, and his shit is on his. its better this way. hopefully.

he'll probably bitch about it. like he does everything else. i feel like i walk on eggshells in my own house.

everytime i talk to him, my head spins and my world falls down.
but he just doesnt get it.
and i wish i could stop loving him.
Not mikey. shut up

how i wish, how i wish you were here
we're just two lost souls swimming in a fish bowl, year after year.
running over the same old ground, what have we found?
the same old fears. wish you were here.
i miss you.
things seems too different.
i dont know whats up.
but im thinking of you, as always♥
cody is living with me now.

i think im going insane. literally.
and thats my update.

i figured i would update every once and awhile. maybe not always weekly.. but every now and then.
im going out with cody now.
i miss hanging out with mikey. he died his hair black. i miss him. hes been pretty down lately.
leah came down last weekend and i had a blast. we hung out with eric. coricidin.
this weekend scott said we'd all go camping, but im doubting that its going to happen.
next weekend leah is coming down for saturday night, because its her birthday. well thursday was. but close enough.
mom sarah and i are getting along well.
im either dropping out, or taking a year off of school. final
thats all.

when you're worried about what your lj friends are going to think of you.

Id love to sit here and just update on everything thats happened, and all the things i feel. and all the confusion. but i feel like every word i say is being judged by someone who has no right to judge. i hate livejournal. and im pretty sure im done with it. ill keep it for the sake of being able to read everyone elses.. and people can comment if they need to talk to me and im not on.. kinda like a message i guess. but im not going to update anything.

i need to find somewhere where i can just say anything and everything. but i have no idea where i could do that. i dont want to keep a paper kinda journal because mom would find it. its time to search for a new undiscovered blogging site.

speaking of which, what the fuck is with the myspace fad. why do all these random stupid people have them. i could probably name about 20 people who dont even belong on myspace. i hate how everything becomes a fad. and im sick of everyone trying to be like everyone else. just fucking get over it and be yourself.

theres alot going on, and i want to write about it, and i want to talk about it. but i cant even talk about it to my best friends, because im so fucking.. i dont know.. im worried about what they might think of me. and i dont want to assume they are thinking the worst. so im going to bottle it up inside, and just not tell anyone. im going to go find another blogging site.

this is my last livejournal entry.

saying..

My dearest Kristen,
I know there will come a day, where I decide I can't handle it anymore. Things are too much for me to handle right now, and they only seem to be getting worse everyday I live. My drug problem is getting out of control. My addiction to coke and heroine are greatly effecting my way of living. I find myself unable to help myself and everyone claims im unreachable. I need you here more than ever. I feel as if you're my only hope, and the only one that can help me, but you're not here. And I can't bring myself to admit to you that I've got a problem. For I only wish that you could be proud of me. If you're reading this letter, than I've failed to make my life make any sense. I want you to know that I love you. In my life, there has been only one person I could look up too. And it was you. Than you moved away and you left me here with nothing but myself and chemicals to alter everything I am. Part of me feels anger towards you. But I wont leave this world with anger in my heart for someone that means so much to me. You always said you'd be there for me... but you're not here and I need you. I feel helpless in a world so full of ugly, a world such as this. I think you're amazing. You brightened up my world and I think you're one of the most amazing, wonderful, loving people I know, and you were always the one to put yourself last, and everyone that meant something to you was more important to you than yourself. I want to apologize. I know that I've made mistakes when it comes to our friendship and I hope oh so much that you'll forgive me for the things I've done to you. And I want to apologize for leaving the world in such a distasteful manner. I know you'll go on without me, but I love you endlessly, and nothing will ever change that. And when I decide to leave this world, I'll watch over you, and I will love you even after death. You're my best friend and I only wish you could be here for me when I need you so badly.
All my love
and my most sincere apologys
maryann.
